forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 55. Southwest wind around 10 mph.

forecast.name: Friday
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 70, with temperatures falling to around 67 in the afternoon. Southwest wind 3 to 17 mph, with gusts as high as 22 mph.

weather_report:
As the quiet hours stretch into the early morning, Downtown San Francisco awakens under a veil of partly cloudy skies. The gentle southwest winds whisper through the streets, marking a refreshing shift that pairs well with the mild low of around 55 degrees. The city is nestled in a tranquil moment before the sun begins its ascent, promising a day that unfolds with sunny clarity. 

Come Friday, residents can expect the warmth of the sun to grace the day, with temperatures climbing to around 70 before settling into a comfortable 67 in the afternoon. The breeze, playful and spirited at 3 to 17 mph, may tease at your collar but undoubtedly adds an element of liveliness to any outing. While the marine layer, known for its legacy art of cloaking our city’s iconic landmarks, will likely linger at the edges, it should mostly part to reveal the illustrious Golden Gate and urban tapestry beyond. In these sweet spots of sunshine, a light jacket or layered clothing will be most prudent—ideal for both captivating vistas and unsuspected cool breezes. 

With such inviting conditions, it's a perfect time for a leisurely stroll along the Embarcadero, perhaps picking up a hot coffee from a local vendor or savoring a pastry as you watch the world slowly come to life. Alternatively, consider polishing up that novel you’ve always meant to read, somewhere cozy in the sun-dappled parks that make this city so welcoming. Whatever your choose, the day beckons with opportunities for simple joys under the glowing California skies.
